condition.narrative: The Borrower shall carry out the project in accordance with the Project Operational Manual acceptable to the Bank, as the same maybe amended from time to time with the agreement of the Bank.

The Borrower shall through MOH ensure that the coordination between RSPC MT and other MoH's subordinated agencies and healthfacilities participating in the implementation of the Project as set forth in the POM.

The Borrower shall vest the overall responsibility for the implementation of the Project in MOH and to this end, through the MOH,shall cause RSPC MT to (i) operate and maintain the PMU responsible for day-to-day management of the Project and (ii) retain orselect and hire, no later than thirty (30) days after the Effective Date, a coordinator, a technical health specialist, a legalspecialist, a monitoring and evaluation specialist, a social and environmental specialist, procurement specialists, a financialspecialist, a communication specialist and others if needed, all under terms of reference and in a manner acceptable to the Bank.
The Borrower, through the MOH, shall cause RSPC MT to prepare and adopt, no later than one (1) month from the Effective Date, anEnvironmental and Social Management Framework satisfactory to the Bank.

The Borrower, through the Ministry of Health (MoH), shall issue a Ministerial Order, under terms and conditions acceptable to theBank (Ministerial Order) which shall include the obligations of Republican Scientific and Practical Center for MedicalTechnologies, Informatization, Administration and Management of Health (RSPC MT) with regard to the implementation of the Project.
The Retroactive financing in the amount of EUR 36,000,000 shall be made available for payments made twelve (12) months prior to theSignature Date for Eligible Expenditures.
